message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $15000. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget constraints. I hope we can come to an agreement.
